name: hoarder
description: Collect and explore time-series metrics using HTTP.
readme:
A node.js implementation of [backstop](https://github.com/obfuscurity/backstop) - well, actually, inspired by backstop but a tad different. Using [hoard](https://github.com/cgbystrom/hoard/) as a back end, enables the storage of time-series data by HTTP POST, and retrieval by HTTP GET. Licence -------
This work by Richard Morrison is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 2.0 UK: England & Wales License.
Based on a work at github.com.
